testimonials.comment: The cleaning performed was truly outstanding! Every single detail was attended to meticulously, resulting in an absolutely flawless outcome. I couldn't be more pleased with the thoroughness in addressing even the hard-to-reach corners and the impressive removal of stubborn stains. The team's professionalism and unwavering commitment were clearly evident, and the entire space felt remarkably rejuvenated and delightful post-service. Without a doubt, I wholeheartedly recommend this exceptional cleaning team to anyone in search of top-tier cleanliness.
testimonials.name: Cassiane Pontel Corso

testimonials.comment: Have tried a couple of different cleaning agencies and my vote goes to Focus Cleaning. They are professional, consistent and responsible. The cleaners are very efficient and does a good job. Usually is the same set of people that comes to clean, so they know what is expected. Missing one star on the rating as they are slightly above market rate.
testimonials.name: Irin Chen

testimonials.comment: Focus cleaners are the best I have ever used. The attention to detail is excellent and they even pick up on things I haven’t mentioned. I’ll definitely keep using them.
testimonials.name: Jacinta Binsted

testimonials.comment: Friendly, trustworthy, responsive and professional with cleaning of the highest care and quality. No hesitation is recommending this lovely group of humans!
testimonials.name: Holly Masters
